content: You definitely did not create this document. This is a slightly modified version of an early and incomplete SAFT that I drafted together with Polychain Capital’s legal advisors. Contracts, like code, have very distinct finger prints based on the author’s style and this is remarkably similar to my style of writing contracts. Not sure how this leaked but If you want the more complete version, reach out. We intend to open source the document in the coming months anyway.
